channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- OpenBook Book Data
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- OpenBook Book Data

item.title: CVE-2022-1842|2024-08-03T00:17:00.917Z -- unknown -- openbook%20book%20data
item.description: The OpenBook Book Data WordPress plugin through 3.5.2 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping as well
